content: miss kitty christmas stocking skill level size approx 7 wide x 21 long materials bulky weight yarn & novelty eyelash yarn as follows lion brand homespun 100% acrylic 185 yds/169 m per 6 oz/170 gm skein 1 skein each #394 golden & #300 hepplewhite yarn bee glitzy girl 100% nylon/acrylic 191 yds per 3 5 oz ball 75 yds color #914 black/gold eyelash size i/9 5 5 mm & g/6 4 25 mm crochet hooks 10 gold 12 mm jingle bells + 1 ½ gold jingle bell 1 4 yds 1/8 satin ribbon - burgundy 2 yds 1/4 satin ribbon - burgundy 1 yd 1/4 satin ribbon - black large-eyed tapestry needle gauge 12 half_double_crochet = 4 7 rnds half_double_crochet = 3 5 with homespun on size i/9 5 5 mm hook stitches/terms beginning beg chain chain decrease decrease double_crochet double_crochet half double_crochet half_double_crochet loop lp remain rem single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet two together decrease slip sl slip_stitch slip_stitch space space stitch st pattern notes stocking is worked in rnds from cuff to toe half_double_crochet & double_crochet rounds are completed with slip_stitch joins and chain-up to begin next round single_crochet rnds are worked in continuous spiral on foot & with slip_stitch joins on heel and toe special stitches shell double_crochet chain-1 double_crochet chain-1 double_crochet chain-1 double_crochet all in same st stocking cuff with gold homespun and size i hook chain 48 join into ring being careful not to twist sts round 1 chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-2 48 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in back loop only blo of ea half_double_crochet around 48 half_double_crochet rnds 3-7 repeat round 2 48 half_double_crochet begin body pattern note work through both loops of sts from this point on round 8 chain 3 double_crochet in next half_double_crochet chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet double_crochet in each of next 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 *skip next half_double_crochet double_crochet in each of next 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beginning chain-3 16 2-double_crochet groups 16 chain-1 sps round 9 slip_stitch to first space chain 3 double_crochet in same space chain 1 *work 2 double_crochet in next space chain 1 repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 16 2-double_crochet groups 16 chain-1 sps rnds 10-19 repeat round 9 at end of last round join with slip_stitch and fasten_off 2 heel opening fold stocking flat with center back where beginning tail is hanging facing you you should see eight 2-double_crochet groups with spaces between count 3 sps to right of center back space attach gold with single_crochet in that space round 1 chain 16 for heel opening skip six 2-double_crochet groups single_crochet in next space single_crochet in the double_crochet only of ea 2-double_crochet group around skip the sps join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 36 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain and single_crochet around 36 single_crochet place thread marker to note beginning of rounds foot worked in continuous spiral
